errors.embed: I do not have the permission to Create Embeds, please make sure I have this permission!
errors.reaction: I do not have the permission to Add Reactions, please make sure I have this permission!
errors.emoji: I do not have the permission to Use External Emojis, please make sure I have this permission!
errors.embedLink: I do not have the permission to Embed Links, please make sure I have this permission!

misc.minigamesDown:
Games are disabled right now, this usually means that there is an update coming soon!
[See the Official server for more info](https://discord.gg/NpnMFCs)
misc.inGame: You cannot run commands while in a game!
misc.memberLeft: has left the server, so the game has been cancelled. You may start a new game though!
misc.memberLeftDM: has left the server, so the game has been cancelled. All functions will not work anymore...
misc.messageDeleted: The game has been cancelled, as the message has been deleted

general.inGame2: Game did not start, as you are in another game
general.maxGames: **There are already 10 games in this server, please wait until one ends!**
general.gameInChannel: **There is already a game going on in this channel!**
general.noPlayerNum:
**How many players are joining this round?**

Please specify by doing `[USAGE]`
general.invalidNum:
That is not a valid player size! You can only have `[RANGE]` players in a room!

Correct usage: `[USAGE]`
general.bySelf: Are you sure you want to start the [GAME] round by yourself?
general.confirmSingle: Are you sure you want to start the [GAME] game?
general.startWithAll:
[HOST], are you sure you want to start the game?
Please wait until all reactions are done being reacted
general.startWithLess:
[HOST], are you sure you want to start the game?
**There are only [MEMBERS]/[MAX] players!**
general.joinWhileGame: **[USER]**, you are already in a game!
general.joinLeave: **[USER]**... You Joined and Left too many times! You sadly cannot join this round...
general.gameFull: I'm sorry, but the game is full!
general.gameCancelled: Game was cancelled by the host...
general.timeOutLobby: **The lobby has ended because the time ran out**
general.timeOutGame: The game took too long, so the game has ended...
general.draw: The game resulted in a draw!
general.noTokens: (You do not earn any tokens playing against a CPU in this game!)
general.dmDisabled: Game Cancelled, as you do not have DM's enabled
general.multipleDMDisabled: Game Cancelled, as one or more people does not have DM's enabled.

connect.instructions: Connect 4 of your Chips in a row!
connect.howToPlay: To play, react with the number you want to place it in.

hangman.description: Try to guess the word, and not let the man hang!
hangman.instructions:
Try to guess the word, and don't let the man hang!
You have **3 Minutes**!
hangman.note: Only [HOST] can participate in this round! To make your own round, do [PREFIX]hangman
hangman.note2: Note: You have to say each letter individually, you cannot say the whole word!
hangman.timeOut: Game Over - Game timed out after 3 minutes
hangman.wordCorrect:
You guessed the word correctly!

The word was [WORD]
[DEFINITION]

(+[TOKENS] Tokens)
hangman.wordIncorrect:
You didn't get the word correct...

The word was **[WORD]**
[DEFINITION]

(+[TOKENS] Tokens)

matchup.instruction: Type the space you want to reveal, like "a1"
matchup.instructions2: Match up two of the same item!
matchup.note: Only [HOST] can participate in this round! To make your own round, do [PREFIX]matchup
matchup.timeOut: Game Over - Game timed out after 5 minutes!
matchup.earnings: You got **[MATCH] matches** and have earned **[TOKENS]** tokens!

quiz.title: Welcome to Discord's Quiz Show!
quiz.hostDesc:
I am your host **Clyde**, and you all have been selected to participate in this **exciting** game show!

The rules are simple! Just **react to the cooresponding emoji to select your answer**!

You will have **30 Seconds** to answer, and there will be **5 Questions**

Are you ready? **React with <:Yes:712036483694854164> to confirm**
The game will automatically start in 2 minutes

**[VOTES]/[MEMBERS] Votes**
quiz.noPerm: The game prematurley ended because I no longer have the permission to [PERM]
quiz.confirm: Alright, let's start this show shall we?
quiz.question: Question #[NUM]
quiz.noPlay: Nobody seemed to want to play... Nobody will be recieving tokens today...
quiz.afk: +0 Tokens (AFK for 3 or more rounds in a row)

rps.disclamer:
Best of 3!

Go to your DM's, and select either Rock, Paper or Scissors!
rps.instructions: React with Rock, Paper or Scissors to play!
rps.playAgain: To play the same thing again, unreact and react to the designated emoji.
rps.winner: The winner of the game is
rps.goBack: You may go back to (SERVER) now!

ttt.instruction: Match 3 of your shape in a row!
ttt.toPlay: To play, react with the specified letter

uno.description: Play the same color or numbered card until you run out!
uno.description2:
Try and get rid of all of your cards in this fun game of Uno!

Your cards are shown above
The current card is shown below
uno.sitBack:
Sit back and relax, it's not your turn yet!
Check up on the lobby to see who's turn it is right now!
Your deck is shown above

You will be mentioned in the lobby when it is your turn, to comply with Discord's spam policy, the bot will not DM you multiple times.
uno.solicited: This DM is solicited by [USER], as they joined this game
uno.lobbyMsg: Play your cards right, and win bragging rights!
uno.add2:
You have been +2'd by **[USER]**!

You have been skipped and gained 2 new cards
uno.add4:
You have been +4'd by **[USER]**!

You have been skipped and gained 4 new cards
The color is now **[COLOR]**

listgames.description: Lists all the games running in this server
listgames.noGames: There are no games running in this server!

stop.description: Stops a game that is running (Moderator and Game Hosts Only)
stop.noGames: There are no games running in this server!
stop.noPerm: You do not have the permission to stop games! You need the `Manage Server` permission!
stop.provideNum:
You must provide the number of the game!
Confused? Do [PREFIX]listgames
stop.invalidNum: That is not a valid game number!
stop.stopOther: You cannot stop another person's game without the `Manage Server` permission!
stop.cancelGame: Cancelled the [GAME] game. You may start a new game though!
stop.cancelDMGame: Cancelled the game. All functions will not work anymore...

buy.description: Lets you buy an icon with your earned tokens
buy.noAcc: You haven't played any games! Come back here once you have!
buy.noIcon: You did not provide what icon you want to buy! Do [PREFIX]shop to see what icons are available, and how to buy them!
buy.invalidIcon: That is not a valid icon! Do [PREFIX]shop to see how to buy an icon!
buy.notEnough:
You don't have enough tokens to buy this icon!
This icon costs **[COST]** Tokens, and you only have **[TOKENS]** Tokens!
buy.success:
Sucessfully bought [ICON] Icon!
To equip it, do `[PREFIX]changeicon [ICON]`

changeicon.description: Lets you change to whatever icon you own
changeicon.noAcc: You haven't played any games! Come back here once you have!
changeicon.noIcons: You don't have any icons! Do [PREFIX]shop to see which ones you can buy, and do [PREFIX]buy to buy an icon to change here!
changeicon.noArgs: You didn't provide an icon to change to!
changeicon.invalidIcon: That is not a valid icon! Check the shop to see the icons!
changeicon.unownedIcon: You do not own that icon!
changeicon.alreadySelected: That is already your selected icon!

leaderboard.description: Shows the top 5 people in the server
leaderboard.noPlayers: Nobody has played any minigames here, so nobody is on the leaderboard!
leaderboard.title: Top 5 in [SERVER]

logs.description: Shows the past 10 games you have played
logs.noAcc: You haven't played any games! Come back here once you have!
logs.title: [USER]'s Logs

profile.description: Lets you see your or another person's stats
profile.noMentionAcc: That user has not played any games!
profile.noAcc: You haven't played any games! Come back here once you have!
profile.note: Note: Playing games with bots do not count towards wins

shop.description: A shop where you can buy icons that display in game and in the lobby
shop.title: Party Games Icon Shop!
shop.info:
Here you can buy many kinds of icons for use in the Lobby and Minigames! Show off by buying one!
To buy one, just do [PREFIX]buy [icon name], instructions will be next to the icon name.

faq.description: Lists the most frequently asked questions about the bot

help.note: Page [PAGE]/4 | React with ▶️ or ◀️ to move pages, and ⏹️ to stop
help.cancel: The Help Command has been cancelled
help.invalidCmd: That is not a valid command!

invite.description: Gives you the invite link to the bot
invite.info: [Bot Invite](https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=703687112410660864&scope=bot&permissions=355392) - To invite the bot to your own server!

links.description: Sends all of the links related to Party Games
links.title: Party Games Links
links.info:
[Party Games Offical Server](https://discord.gg/NpnMFCs) - Get support, or just play minigames!

[Bot Invite](https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=703687112410660864&scope=bot&permissions=355392) - To invite the bot to your own server!

[Top.gg Vote](https://top.gg/bot/703687112410660864/vote) - Vote Link 1
[Discordbotlist.com Vote](https://discordbotlist.com/bots/discord-party/upvote) - Vote Link 2

server.description: Sends the invite link to the Offical Party Games server
server.title: Party Games Server Invite
server.info: [Party Games Offical Server](https://discord.gg/NpnMFCs) - Get support, or just play minigames!

vote.description: Sends a link where you can vote for Party Games!
vote.title: Vote Links

setlang.description: Sets the language for the bot in the server
setlang.game: There's a game going on in this server, please wait for when that one finishes, or cancel the game
setlang.select: Select a language to change to
setlang.alreadyChosen: That is already the selected language!
setlang.success: Sucessfully changed the language to English

setprefix.description: Sets the prefix for the server (Moderator Only)
setprefix.error: Uh oh... An error occured, try the command again!
setprefix.noPrefix: You did not provide a prefix!
setprefix.tooLong: That prefix is too long! Please limit it to 5 characters!
setprefix.invalidChars: That prefix has invalid characters! Please remove them!
setprefix.success: Sucessfully set the prefix in **[SERVER]** to **[PREFIX]**
